name: Bastos.github.io
body:
### Welcome to Bastos Home Page

I'm a very, very, very nice developer that lives in both mobile and backend world. I'm also a pizza lover and brazilian. If you come here, you'll probably see me walking barefoot, talking loudly, laughing about anything and listening music.

### More about me

Just go to my [blog](http://blog.tiagobastos.me)!

### Want to talk?

Send me an email: code # tiagobastos # me
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
